sentences.en: Unsupported mothers are one of the fastest-growing groups of welfare claimants.
sentences.cn: 无经济支持的母亲们是申请福利的群体中人数增长速度最快的一部分。

sentences.en: Ireland was one of the fastest-growing economies in Western Europe in the 1990s.
sentences.cn: 在20世纪90年代爱尔兰是西欧经济发展最快的国家之一。

sentences.en: China has arguably the fastest-growing operations in Antarctica.
sentences.cn: 中国在南极的行动无疑是增长最快的。
